pullrequest.title: Part of #965 that I missed in pull request #857

content.raw: You're exactly right, we need to keep the childrenEnd around for 1.x and 2.x. The goal of pull request #857 (and this one too) is to remove all references to childrenEnd in for loops, since it was causing segfaults in OSX Mavericks. I will remove the childrenEnd variable in a separate pull request to the default branch after we merge this forward (see bc0ae5c in branch issue_965_default as the first portion of that pull request).
content.html: You're exactly right, we need to keep the childrenEnd around for 1.x and 2.x. The goal of pull request #857 (and this one too) is to remove all references to childrenEnd in for loops, since it was causing segfaults in OSX Mavericks. I will remove the childrenEnd variable in a separate pull request to the default branch after we merge this forward (see bc0ae5c in branch issue_965_default as the first portion of that pull request).
